price: O gün, zalim iki elini ısıracak ve şöyle diyecektir: Ah ne olurdu, ben de Peygamber’le birlikte yol tutmuş olsaydım!
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaʿaḍḍu al-ẓālimu ʿalā yadayhi yaqūlu yālaytanī ittakhadhtu maʿa al-rasūli sabīlan
